Posts.Content: Hi a dear friend sent me this - I thought oh no more herbal stuff !   but thought I'd squirt it over my pillow anyway - and it s brilliant.  I don't use it every night but when the old mind won't shut up with the 'what ifs' I use it http://www.thisworks.com/sleep-plus-pillow-spray-75ml.html?gclid=CM7AzI_2tdICFUI_GwodaR0Eiw#sthash.qwUziKtI.dpbs it might be worth checking out Xx
Posts.Title: Any tips on ways to get some sleep after lumpectomy?
